title: Enhancing Nursing Practice Competency: STEM Learning Design Utilizing Collaborative Online Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply a 12-activity framework to assess STEM learning design competencies in collaborative online environments.
Learners can analyze discourse data from the design process using Epistemic Network Analysis (ENA) to identify differences in learner competencies.
Learners can develop effective STEM learning planning strategies by comparing characteristics of traditional instructional design and backward design patterns.
Learners can model STEM design competency development pathways over time and provide personalized feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
